lines.text: Well I hope you two are really happy together.
We're not together.
Oh don't be so modest, he's a great catch.
I'm not trying to catch anyone.
I mean he could have anyone he wanted. He's used to the best of everything and he chose you.
Are you trying to intimidate me?
Now why on earth would I do that?
[she smiles]
I'll see you tonight at the gala.
I've been calling you all day.
I know, I I've been busy.
I can tell, you're a mess. Well you better hurry if we're still going to go to the gala party tonight.
Yeah, about that.
We are still going, aren't we?
No, I guess not.
I see. Meaning your not going at all or your not going with me?
Look Christy, I think your a great person and I have really enjoyed getting to know you better but right now it.
Please.
My life.
Please I don't even wanna hear this. It's all pretty evident.
We haven't actually met, I'm Christy.
Hi.
You were pretty impression out in that boat today. I thought maybe you should be racing on Sunday. Oh I see Mrs. Beesley I better go say hi. By the way, nice pants.
How you doing sweetheart?
I am so not impressed Rowdy.
That's not what you were saying a couple of months ago.
